lines.text: Those weird tattoos on the dead wizard's face- they explain everything!
What? How's that?
...You're gonna explain, right?
...Probably!
Um...
They're... ancient spirit-summoning tattoos that call up the ghosts of the dead!
He summoned the ghost of that robber there, and-
Normally I'd ask if you were just makin' things up, but... I don't have to ask, this time.
Get serious, Seeker.
Come on! I can't have a little fun?
Exactly.
Booooo.
Well... if a Go Wizard needs those tattoos to cast their spells, then...
Well, maybe the dead wizard made a house call to a tattoo artist?
And that tattoo artist... cast a hologram spell, to use as like a model for how the tattoos would look?
But they ran away or died or something before they could dispel it?
They never got around to putting the tattoos on the hologram, either, it looks like.
That's... an extremely specific theory.
Brilliant, right?
...No. Without evidence, that much detail is just a load of guesswork.
You got evidence?
...Not really.
Then quit makin' stuff up and try somethin' else.
